ðŸ“– Summary: SimpMusic is a free and open-source Android music player that utilizes YouTube Music as its backend. It offers features like ad-free background playback, browsing YouTube Music content, offline playback, synced lyrics, and support for SponsorBlock and Return YouTube Dislike, aiming to provide a comprehensive music listening experience.
